#print(new_x)

x = [5, 2, 20, 15, 32, 100]

new_x = []
for i in range(len(x)):
  if ((x[i] % 2) == 0):
    if ((x[i] % 10) == 0):
      new_x.append((x[i] ** 2))
    else:
      new_x.append(x[i])
print(new_x)
